description:
Charley has had a crush on Abe for quite some time.
“The first time I saw his video,” he said. “I was hooked.”
So when he finally got to meet in Abe in person he was a little star-struck.
“Wow... he’s even hotter in person!” Charley remarked. “He’s so big!”
The two of them had a lot of fun together. I especially liked the reaction Abe got when he stuck his tongue in Charley’s ear!
title: Abe & Charley: Bareback
